00036         {
00037                 super();
00038                 setDefaultAction(new BaseAction("GetList", new TaskEntity()));
00039                 setVisibleName("Système");
00040                 addGlobalActionMenuItem("Modules", new BaseAction("GetList",
00041                                 new ModuleEntity()));
00042                 addGlobalActionMenuItem("Tâches", new BaseAction("GetList",
00043                                 new TaskEntity()));
00044                 addGlobalActionMenuItem("Spécification", new BaseAction("GetList",
00045                                 new Specification()));
00046                 addGlobalActionMenuItem("Effet", new BaseAction("GetList",
00047                                 new EffectEntity()));
00048                 addGlobalActionMenuItem("Entités de recherches", new BaseAction(
00049                                 "GetList", new SearchEntity()));
00050                 addGlobalActionMenuItem("Critères de recherches", new BaseAction(
00051                                 "GetList", new SearchCriteria()));
00052                 addGlobalActionMenuItem("Paramètres", new BaseAction("GetList",
00053                                 new Parameter()));
00054                 addGlobalActionMenuItem("Voir le shcéma de DB", new DbGraph());
00055         }

00079         private static void intiDynamicFieldTask()
00080         {
00081                 EntityEntity fieldEntity = new EntityEntity();
00082                 fieldEntity.setData("systemName", "FieldEntity");
00083                 fieldEntity = (EntityEntity) Orm.selectUnique(fieldEntity);
00084 
00085                 SearchCriteriaOperator equals = new SearchCriteriaOperator();
00086                 equals.setData("name", "=");
00087                 equals = (SearchCriteriaOperator) Orm.selectUnique(equals);
00088 
00089                 SearchEntity searchEntity = new SearchEntity();
00090                 searchEntity.setData("name", "Pour field dynamique écrit");
00091                 searchEntity.assign(fieldEntity);
00092                 searchEntity.newE();
00093 
00094                 SearchCriteria searchCriteria = new SearchCriteria();
00095                 searchCriteria.setData("key", "dynamicField");
00096                 searchCriteria.assign(searchEntity);
00097                 searchCriteria.setData("value", "true");
00098                 searchCriteria.assign(equals);
00099                 searchCriteria.newE();
00100 
00101                 Specification specification = new Specification();
00102                 specification.setData("name", "Lorsqu'un field dynamique est écrit");
00103                 specification.assign(searchEntity);
00104                 specification.newE();
00105 
00106                 ActionEntity action = new ActionEntity();
00107                 action.setData("systemName", "AddFieldToOrm");
00108                 action = (ActionEntity) Orm.selectUnique(action);
00109 
00110                 EffectEntity effet = new EffectEntity();
00111                 effet.setData("name", "On ajoute ce field dans l'Orm");
00112                 effet.assign(searchEntity);
00113                 effet.assign(action);
00114                 effet.newE();
00115 
00116                 TaskEntity task = new TaskEntity();
00117                 task.setData("isActive", true);
00118                 task.setData("straightSearch", true);
00119                 task.assign(effet);
00120                 task.assign(specification);
00121                 task.newE();
00122         }

00347         private static void initEmployeeNewUserTask()
00348         {
00349                 // les entitées suivantes sont là juste
00350                 // pour tester
00351                 Parameter parameter = new Parameter();
00352                 parameter.setData("key", "message");
00353                 parameter
00354                                 .setData("value",
00355                                                 "Voici votre nouveau compte utilisateur :Employee.firstName:Employee.lastName");
00356                 // parameter.setData("value", ":Employee.firstName:Employee.lastName");
00357                 parameter.newE();
00358 
00359                 SearchCriteriaOperator equals = new SearchCriteriaOperator();
00360                 equals.setData("name", "=");
00361                 equals = (SearchCriteriaOperator) Orm.selectUnique(equals);
00362 
00363                 EntityEntity entity = new EntityEntity();
00364                 entity.setData("systemName", "Employee");
00365                 entity = (EntityEntity) Orm.selectUnique(entity);
00366 
00367                 SearchEntity searchEntity = new SearchEntity();
00368                 searchEntity.setData("name", "Employe sans login");
00369                 searchEntity.setData(entity.getForeignKeyName(),
00370                                 entity.getPrimaryKeyValue());
00371                 searchEntity.newE();
00372 
00373                 User user = new User();
00374                 user.setData("name", "unLogedUser");
00375                 user = (User) Orm.selectUnique(user);
00376 
00377                 SearchCriteria searchCriteria = new SearchCriteria();
00378                 searchCriteria.setData("key", new User().getForeignKeyName());
00379                 searchCriteria.setData(searchEntity.getForeignKeyName(),
00380                                 searchEntity.getPrimaryKeyValue());
00381                 searchCriteria.setData(
00382                                 new SearchCriteriaOperator().getForeignKeyName(),
00383                                 equals.getPrimaryKeyValue());
00384                 searchCriteria.setData("value", user.getPrimaryKeyValue());
00385                 searchCriteria.newE();
00386 
00387                 ActionEntity actionEntity = new ActionEntity();
00388                 actionEntity.setData("systemName", "CreateUserForEmployee");
00389                 actionEntity = (ActionEntity) actionEntity.get().get(0);
00390 
00391                 EffectEntity effect = new EffectEntity();
00392                 effect.setData("name", "On cre un login");
00393                 effect.setData(searchEntity.getForeignKeyName(),
00394                                 searchEntity.getPrimaryKeyValue());
00395                 // effect.setData(actionEntity.getForeignKeyName(), actionEntity
00396                 // .getPrimaryKeyValue());
00397                 effect.assign(actionEntity);
00398                 effect.newE();
00399 
00400                 Specification specification = new Specification();
00401                 specification.setData("name", "Si employe pas encore de login");
00402                 specification.setData(searchEntity.getForeignKeyName(),
00403                                 searchEntity.getPrimaryKeyValue());
00404                 specification.newE();
00405 
00406                 TaskEntity task = new TaskEntity();
00407                 task.setData("isActive", false);
00408                 task.setData("straightSearch", false);
00409                 task.setData(specification.getForeignKeyName(),
00410                                 specification.getPrimaryKeyValue());
00411                 task.setData(effect.getForeignKeyName(), effect.getPrimaryKeyValue());
00412                 task.newE();
00413         }

00415         private static void initSearchCriteriaOperators()
00416         {
00417                 // Les entitées suivantes sont là pour avoir des données par default
00418                 // qu'on doit garder
00419 
00420                 SearchCriteriaOperator searchCriteriaOperator;
00421 
00422                 searchCriteriaOperator = new SearchCriteriaOperator();
00423                 searchCriteriaOperator.setData("name", "=");
00424                 searchCriteriaOperator.newE();
00425 
00426                 searchCriteriaOperator = new SearchCriteriaOperator();
00427                 searchCriteriaOperator.setData("name", "!=");
00428                 searchCriteriaOperator.newE();
00429 
00430                 searchCriteriaOperator = new SearchCriteriaOperator();
00431                 searchCriteriaOperator.setData("name", ">");
00432                 searchCriteriaOperator.newE();
00433 
00434                 searchCriteriaOperator = new SearchCriteriaOperator();
00435                 searchCriteriaOperator.setData("name", "<");
00436                 searchCriteriaOperator.newE();
00437 
00438                 searchCriteriaOperator = new SearchCriteriaOperator();
00439                 searchCriteriaOperator.setData("name", ">=");
00440                 searchCriteriaOperator.newE();
00441 
00442                 searchCriteriaOperator = new SearchCriteriaOperator();
00443                 searchCriteriaOperator.setData("name", "<=");
00444                 searchCriteriaOperator.newE();
00445 
00446                 searchCriteriaOperator = new SearchCriteriaOperator();
00447                 searchCriteriaOperator.setData("name", "in");
00448                 searchCriteriaOperator.newE();
00449 
00450                 searchCriteriaOperator = new SearchCriteriaOperator();
00451                 searchCriteriaOperator.setData("name", "is");
00452                 searchCriteriaOperator.newE();
00453 
00454                 searchCriteriaOperator = new SearchCriteriaOperator();
00455                 searchCriteriaOperator.setData("name", "like");
00456                 searchCriteriaOperator.newE();
00457         }

00459         private static void initActionsAndEntities()
00460         {
00461                 // Les entitées suivantes sont là pour avoir des données par default
00462                 // qu'on doit garder
00463 
00464                 String moduleForeignKey = new ModuleEntity().getForeignKeyName();
00465 
00466                 ModuleEntity moduleEntity;
00467 
00468                 moduleEntity = new ModuleEntity();
00469                 moduleEntity.setData("systemName", "...");
00470                 moduleEntity.setData("visibleName", "...");
00471                 moduleEntity.newE();
00472 
00473                 ActionEntity actionEntity;
00474 
00475                 actionEntity = new ActionEntity();
00476                 actionEntity.setData(moduleForeignKey,
00477                                 moduleEntity.getPrimaryKeyValue());
00478                 actionEntity.setData("systemName", "Get");
00479                 actionEntity.newE();
00480 
00481                 actionEntity = new ActionEntity();
00482                 actionEntity.setData(moduleForeignKey,
00483                                 moduleEntity.getPrimaryKeyValue());
00484                 actionEntity.setData("systemName", "New");
00485                 actionEntity.newE();
00486 
00487                 actionEntity = new ActionEntity();
00488                 actionEntity.setData(moduleForeignKey,
00489                                 moduleEntity.getPrimaryKeyValue());
00490                 actionEntity.setData("systemName", "Edit");
00491                 actionEntity.newE();
00492 
00493                 actionEntity = new ActionEntity();
00494                 actionEntity.setData(moduleForeignKey,
00495                                 moduleEntity.getPrimaryKeyValue());
00496                 actionEntity.setData("systemName", "Delete");
00497                 actionEntity.newE();
00498 
00499                 actionEntity = new ActionEntity();
00500                 actionEntity.setData(moduleForeignKey,
00501                                 moduleEntity.getPrimaryKeyValue());
00502                 actionEntity.setData("systemName", "GetList");
00503                 actionEntity.newE();
00504 
00505                 EntityEntity entityEntity;
00506 
00507                 Module module = null;
00508                 Vector<String> allModule;
00509                 allModule = new Vector<String>(ListModule.getAllModules());
00510                 // on s'assure d'avoir créé le userRightModule en premier
00511                 for (String moduleName : allModule)
00512                 {
00513                         module = ListModule.getModule(moduleName);
00514 
00515                         moduleEntity = new ModuleEntity();
00516                         moduleEntity.setData("systemName", moduleName);
00517                         moduleEntity.setData("visibleName", module.getVisibleName());
00518                         moduleEntity.newE();
00519 
00520                         for (String actionName : module.getActionList().keySet())
00521                         {
00522                                 actionEntity = new ActionEntity();
00523                                 actionEntity.setData(moduleForeignKey,
00524                                                 moduleEntity.getPrimaryKeyValue());
00525                                 actionEntity.setData("systemName", actionName);
00526                                 actionEntity.newE();
00527                         }
00528 
00529                         for (String entityName : module.getEntityDefinitionList().keySet())
00530                         {
00531                                 AbstractOrmEntity realEntity = module.getEntityDefinitionList()
00532                                                 .get(entityName);
00533 
00534                                 entityEntity = new EntityEntity();
00535                                 entityEntity.setData(moduleForeignKey,
00536                                                 moduleEntity.getPrimaryKeyValue());
00537                                 entityEntity.setData("systemName", entityName);
00538                                 entityEntity
00539                                                 .setData("visibleName", realEntity.getVisibleName());
00540                                 entityEntity.newE();
00541 
00542                                 initFieldEntitiesForEntityEntity(entityEntity, realEntity);
00543                                 initAccessorEntityListForEntityEntity(entityEntity,
00544                                                 realEntity.getAccessorNameList());
00545                         }
00546                 }
00547         }
00548 
00549         private static void initAccessorEntityListForEntityEntity(
00550                         EntityEntity entityEntity, Vector<String> accessorNameList)
00551 
00552         {
00553                 for (String accessorName : accessorNameList)
00554                 {
00555                         AccessorEntity accessorEntity = new AccessorEntity();
00556                         accessorEntity.assign(entityEntity);
00557                         accessorEntity.setData("foreignEntityName", accessorName);
00558                         accessorEntity.newE();
00559                 }
00560         }
00561 
00562         private static void initFieldEntitiesForEntityEntity(
00563                         EntityEntity entityEntity, AbstractOrmEntity realEntity)
00564 
00565         {
00566                 realEntity.initFields();
00567 
00568                 for (Field<?> field : realEntity.getFields())
00569                         initFieldEntity(field, entityEntity);
00570         }
00571 
00572         private static void initFieldEntity(Field<?> field,
00573                         EntityEntity entityEntity)
00574 
00575         {
00576                 FieldTypeEntity fieldType = getOrCreateFieldType(field);
00577                 FieldEntity fieldEntity = new FieldEntity();
00578                 fieldEntity.setData("name", field.getShortName());
00579                 fieldEntity.setData("visibleName", field.getName());
00580                 fieldEntity.setData("readOnly", field.isReadOnly());
00581                 fieldEntity.setData("hidden", field.isHidden());
00582                 fieldEntity.setData("naturalKey", field.isNaturalKey());
00583                 fieldEntity.setData("dynamicField", field.isDynamicField());
00584                 fieldEntity.assign(fieldType);
00585                 fieldEntity.assign(entityEntity);
00586                 fieldEntity.newE();
00587         }
00588 
00589         private static FieldTypeEntity getOrCreateFieldType(Field<?> field)
00590 
00591         {
00592                 FieldTypeEntity fieldType = new FieldTypeEntity();
00593                 fieldType.setData("systemName", field.getSystemName());
00594 
00595                 Vector<AbstractOrmEntity> result = Orm.select(fieldType);
00596 
00597                 if (result.size() > 0)
00598                         return (FieldTypeEntity) result.get(0);
00599 
00600                 fieldType.newE();
00601                 return fieldType;
00602         }
00603 }
